org.dsa.iot.dslink.util

Class UrlBase64

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.util.UrlBase64

  • public class UrlBase64
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles base64 encodings. All encodings are UTF-8.

      UrlBase64()

        public static java.lang.String encode(byte[] data,
                                      java.lang.String encoding)
        Encodes the following data into a string for base64 for the specified encoding. The padding is explicitly removed.
        Parameters:
        data - Array of data to encode.
        encoding - Encoding to encode the bytes into after the base64 encoding.
        Returns:
        A base64 encoded string.

      • decodeToString
